title: Visma-Lease a Bike is Using Time Trial Helmets in Road Races: A Sign of Things to Come?
content:
Visma-LAB confirms selected use of aero-efficient TT helmets in road races after Wout van Aert and Niklas Behrens spotted training and racing in the Giro Aerohead.

Read the full article at Visma-Lease a Bike is Using Time Trial Helmets in Road Races: A Sign of Things to Come? on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
